page.title: 07FISHING
page.content: THE BASE OF THE CLIFFS UNDER NORTH HILL ARE IDEAL FOR FISHING. THE LOCAL BOYS AND MEN, SOME OF WHOM KNOW A GREAT DEAL ABOUT THE LOCAL FISHING, FEEL THAT THIS COASTLINE IS ONE OF THE BEST FOR BEACH CASTING. THEY GO OUT AT ALL TIMES OF YEAR TO CATCH THE MAIN CROP OF FISH ONE WOULD FIND ANYWHERE ON THE COASTS OF ENGLAND AND WALES. SOME OF THE BEST CATCHES ARE OF BASS, CONGER EEL, MACKEREL AND FLAT FISH. IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR ANYONE WHO IS SERIOUSLY INTERESTED IN FISHING BOTH AS A SPORT AND FOR EATING.
